thread.title: "It's disrespectful and untrue!" Coleen Nolan is FURIOUS at suggestion she's too close to married housemate James Cosmo
thread.title_full: "It's disrespectful and untrue!" Coleen Nolan is FURIOUS at suggestion she's too close to married housemate James Cosmo

author: Lara Martin
title: "It's disrespectful and untrue!" Coleen Nolan is FURIOUS at suggestion she's too close to married housemate James Cosmo
text:
TV "It's disrespectful and untrue!" Coleen Nolan is FURIOUS at suggestion she's too close to married housemate James Cosmo Coleen vehemently denied suggestion she was too close to James C, saying they'd just struck up a very close friendship Share Get celebs updates directly to your inbox + Subscribe Thank you for subscribing! Could not subscribe, try again later Invalid Email 
Coleen Nolan is FURIOUS with Kim Woodburn after she suggested Coleen was getting too close to Celebrity Big Brother housemate James Cosmo. 
The married Loose Women star ranted in the Diary Room about the insinuation she was getting too close to married co-star James C, as they spend a lot of time together chatting and smoking in the garden. 
Ranting in the Diary Room, Coleen said: “Making out like we’re having this bloody love affair. It’s disrespectful and so not like that at all. 
“I’ve made such a good friend in James C.” Coleen was furious about the insinuation (Photo: Channel 5) Coleen and James are often seen chatting in the house (Photo: Channel 5) They've struck up a firm friendship (Photo: Channel 5) Read More When is the Celebrity Big Brother 2017 final? Date, time and all you need to know about the exciting finale 
“As of this moment until we leave and until I die, I am not speaking to that woman again. 
“She is vile, horrible, nasty; the vilest woman I’ve ever known, met or wish to meet. She’s the most fake, horrible woman.” 
The suggestion came up during a task in the CBB house tonight, when housemates had to answer questions about each other. Jedward had joked: “[James C] is too busy flirting with Coleen on a regular basis, flirting with the eyes, eye contact is strong.” Video Loading Click to play Tap to play The video will start in 8 Cancel Play now
